name: Tropical Fruit Pops
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Making these frozen pops is like a salute to summer. Assemble each treat with your pick of strawberries, kiwi fruit, papaya, or melon. Each one tastes great in these sweet heart-healthy frozen snacks. And each fruit adds a splash of color.
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely chopped or sliced fresh fruit (such as strawberries, kiwifruit, papaya and/or melon)
directions: In a blender, combine guava nectar, pineapple juice, and fresh pineapple chunks
Divide chopped or sliced fruit among 12 frozen treat molds or 4- to 6-ounce paper cups
Pour blended mixture over the fruit
Cover each cup with Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil; make a small hole in the aluminum foil with a knife and insert a wooden stick into each cup through the hole
Freeze about 4 hours or until firm
Remove foil and cup to serve
